title: Cream pitcher from a tea service
description: cream pitcher (part of coffee service), oval urn-shape on high foot with shaped outline; around shoulder an applied silver band chased with alternating octagon and twisted rop pattern; on each side a set-in round medallion of silver with border of chased saw tooth and leaf pattern; medallion on front carries monogram <F.M.> in octagonal panel; handle restored at junction of body
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
